Module cz.zcu.kiv.ir.silhavyj.searchengine
Package cz.zcu.kiv.ir.silhavyj.searchengine.query.lexer

Class QueryLexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.zcu.kiv.ir.silhavyj.searchengine.query.lexer.QueryLexer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IQueryLexer
    public class QueryLexer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IQueryLexer
    Author:
    Jakub Silhavy This class works as a lexer of a query that the user inputs into the application. Its purpose is to tokenize a raw string. The tokens will be then used by the parser to evaluate the query.
